alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Franklin; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO, EASTERN CLARK COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Choctaw Lake, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Hilliard, Marysville, Plain City, West Jefferson, Choctaw Lake, New California, Milford Center, Lafayette, Woodstock, Unionville Center, Interstate 70 at US Route 42, Amity, State Route 29 at State Route 38, Rosedale, State Route 4 at State Route 161, Resaca, US Route 33 at US Route 42, Interstate 70 at State Route 56 and Chuckery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
